name: zebra
description: small node app to serve a static file and trigger a zpl printer

scripts.changelog:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.changelog:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.changelog:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m 'chore(package): update package version to %s'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore(package): update package version to %s'
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore(package): update package version to %s'
scripts.release:major: npm run changelog:major && npm run version:major && git push --follow-tags origin
scripts.release:minor: npm run changelog:minor && npm run version:minor && git push --follow-tags origin
scripts.release:patch: npm run changelog:patch && npm run version:patch && git push --follow-tags origin

author: Dave Lowther
